classes.cCustomNote: Any Approved Elective course can go here. At least 7 units must be 300-400 level. Consult with an academic advisor regarding career tracks. See the online catalog for course options.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, E, F, and GE Elective. Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to the online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP), and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). The USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, D2, Upper-Division D, or E.
Choose one of the following: DSCI102, or ASCI339.

Choose one of the following: BIO111, or BIO161.

BIO111 and BIO161 is required in support; also satisfies GE.

Students focusing on Dairy Foods should take BIO161.
